p: Similar to the SARS-CoV outbreak, therapeutic options such as ribavirin, interferons, and corticosteroids shown tiny to no clinical usefulness, notwithstanding efficacy exhibition in nonhuman primates [76]. The ongoing multicenter, randomized controlled trial, the MIRACLE (MERS-CoV Infection treated with A Combination of LPV/r and intErferon-β1b) trial targeting the result of 3 months fatality expected to come with conclusive investigations on the effectiveness of blend therapy of LPV/r and recombinant IF-β1b [77].
